FuncDef:
The unknown-multicast discard command disables interfaces in a BD from forwarding unknown multicast packets.
The undo unknown-multicast discard command restores the default configuration.
The unknown-unicast discard command disables interfaces in a BD from forwarding unknown unicast packets.
The undo unknown-unicast discard command restores the default configuration.
By default, interfaces in a BD forward unknown multicast, and unknown unicast packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When interfaces in a BD receive unknown unicast packets, or unknown unicast packets, the interfaces broadcast these packets in the BD. If the interfaces broadcast a large number of attack packets, the forwarding and security of other packets are threatened.
To disable interfaces in a BD from forwarding unknown unicast packets, or unknown unicast packets, run this command.
